body:
Lots of links in the documentation currently lead to 404s. There are even more in the current [published](http://kubernetes.io/v1.0/docs/) version.

In addition to fixing these, we should either set up a test or a pre-commit hook to check that URLs are valid.

Hacky regex, not including relative URLs:

``` console
$ for MATCH in $(ag -o 'https?://[^) "\]\n]+[^) "\]\n.]' docs -G ".*\.md$"); do URL=$(echo $MATCH | sed 's/.*\(http.*\)/\1/'); if [ $(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" $URL) -eq "404" ]; then echo $MATCH; fi; done
docs/user-guide/kubectl/kubectl_replace.md:47:https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/HEAD/docs/api-reference/definitions.html
docs/user-guide/replication-controller.md:127:https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/HEAD/docs/api-reference/definitions.html#_v1_replicationcontroller
docs/user-guide/pods.md:167:https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/HEAD/docs/api-reference/definitions.html#_v1_pod
docs/user-guide/services.md:590:https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/HEAD/docs/api-reference/definitions.html#_v1_service
docs/user-guide/pod-states.md:58:https://godoc.org/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1#Probe
docs/user-guide/pod-states.md:58:https://godoc.org/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1#Handler
docs/user-guide/pod-states.md:77:https://godoc.org/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1#PodStatus
docs/user-guide/pod-states.md:77:https://godoc.org/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1#ContainerState
docs/user-guide/deploying-applications.md:79:https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/HEAD/docs/api-reference/definitions.html#_v1_replicationcontroller
docs/user-guide/connecting-applications.md:131:https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/HEAD/docs/api-reference/definitions.html#_v1_service
docs/user-guide/configuring-containers.md:112:https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/HEAD/docs/api-reference/definitions.html#_v1_pod
docs/user-guide/images.md:93:https://www.googleapis.com/auth/devstorage.read_only`,
docs/user-guide/kubectl/kubectl_patch.md:45:https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/HEAD/docs/api-reference/definitions.html
docs/getting-started-guides/coreos/bare_metal_offline.md:243:https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/v0.15.0/bin/linux/amd64/kubecfg
docs/getting-started-guides/coreos/bare_metal_offline.md:246:https://storage.googleapis.com/k8s/flanneld

```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to documentation.
labels.name: kind/documentation

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

title: Documentation 404s
